Gubernur Kalteng Lempar Botol, Ketua PSSI Baru Siap Beri Hukuman
02 Nov 2019, 12:10 by Irsyan Hasyim (Kontributor), Nurdin Saleh
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Ketua Umum PSSI Periode 2019-2023, Mochamad Iriawan alias Iwan Bule, mengatakan bahwa tindakan Gubernur Kalimantan Tengah Sugianto Sabran melempar botol di stadion merupakan sebuah pelanggaran.
Mantan Kapolda Metro Jaya ini mengatakan tindakan seperti itu tidak boleh dilakukan oleh siapapun. "Nanti akan kami evaluasi hukuman apa yang diberikan," kata Iwan Bule di Hotel Shangri-La, Jakarta, Sabtu, 2 November 2019.
Sebelumnha, aksi Gubernur Kalimantan Tengah Sugianto Sabran saat menyaksikan laga Kalteng Putra vs Persib Bandung, Jumat, 1 November 2019, menjadi viral di media sosial. Orang nomor satu di Kalteng itu pun menjadi bulan-bulanan kritik netizen.
Aksi negatif Sugianto Sabran, yang terjadi dalam laga yang dimenangi Persib 2-0, terekam video dan kemudian menjadi viral di media sosial. Video itu antara lain diunggah Heni Unique (@heniunique).



Pada video itu, terlihat ulah Gubernur saat berada di tribun VVIP Stadion Tuah Pahoe, Jalan Tjilik Riwut, Palangka Raya. Mengenakan kaus warna oranye dan topi warna hitam, ia terlihat melempar botol air mineral ke arah lapangan.
Sugianto juga terlihat marah-marah sambil menunjuk-nunjuk sebelum turun dari tribun VVIP ke pinggir lapangan. Ia menghampiri Kapolres Palangka Raya AKBP Timbul Siregar dan memarahinya.
IRSYAN HASYIM

Central Kalimantan Governor Throwing Bottles, New PSSI Chair Ready to Give Punishment
02 Nov 2019, 12:10 by Irsyan Hasyim (Contributor), Nurdin Saleh
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - General Chair of PSSI 2019-2023, Mochamad Iriawan alias Iwan Bule, said that Central Kalimantan Governor Sugianto Sabran's action of throwing bottles at the stadium was a violation.
The former Metro Jaya Police Chief said that such actions should not be carried out by anyone. "We will evaluate what punishment is given later," Iwan Bule said at the Shangri-La Hotel, Jakarta, Saturday, November 2, 2019.
Before that, the action of Central Kalimantan Governor Sugianto Sabran while watching the Kalteng Putra vs Persib Bandung match, Friday, November 1, 2019, became viral on social media. The number one person in Central Kalimantan became a hotbed of criticism from netizens.
Sugianto Sabran's negative action, which took place in the match won by Persib 2-0, was recorded on video and then went viral on social media. The video was uploaded, among others, by Heni Unique (@heniunique).



In the video, the governor's actions were seen while in the VVIP stands of Tuah Pahoe Stadium, Jalan Tjilik Riwut, Palangka Raya. Wearing an orange shirt and black hat, he was seen throwing bottles of mineral water toward the field.
Sugianto also looked angry while pointing before descending from the VVIP stands to the edge of the field. He approached the Police Chief of Palangkaraya AKBP Timbul Siregar and scolded him.
IRSYAN HASYIM
